lc_content:
Get Involved! Currently, this project is a volunteer effort. Our major goal for this year is to secure funding so we can hire more tutors and develop more material so we can help more students.
So as a startup we're of course looking for lots of help. If you want to get involved as a:
Tutor
Board Member
Member of our Curriculum Development Task Group
Financial Contributor
Student (yes, we're taking new students right now!)
please contact us for more information.
Financial Donations Make a tax deductible donation today!
Catalyst is a registered 501(c)(3) with the Internal Revenue Service. Any contribution to Catalyst is fully tax deductible.
Contact
